definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Many traditional dishes in Japan have a soup base, like miso soup and udon noodles.
sentences.chinese: 日本传统佳肴都会搭配汤类，如味增汤和乌冬面。

sentences.english: Meat ball Soup is one of my favorite soups.
sentences.chinese: 贡丸汤是我最喜爱的汤类之一。

sentences.english: Scatter is with a free soups and all packages are given with fruit and beverages.
sentences.chinese: 散点赠送汤类一份，所有套餐均配送水果和饮料。

sentences.english: Soups and other foods are made with dal .
sentences.chinese: 汤类和一些其他的食品都是用木豆做成的。

sentences.english: Soup is one of my favorite soups.
sentences.chinese: 贡丸汤是我最喜爱的汤类之一。

definition: hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
food made from wheat flour, such as noodles, dumplings, buns etc
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
non-vegetarian dish (including meat, fish, garlic, onion etc)
